thread.title: On Kangana Ranaut's Birthday, Here Are 4 Things We Should Learn From Her Famous Characters
thread.title_full: On Kangana Ranaut's Birthday, Here Are 4 Things We Should Learn From Her Famous Characters

title: On Kangana Ranaut's Birthday, Here Are 4 Things We Should Learn From Her Famous Characters
text:
facebook 511 SHARES 
Kangana Ranaut is fearless, outspoken, and basically a role model for every woman of today. She sticks to her beliefs firmly, isn't afraid to speak her mind, and never lets anyone tell her she is not good enough. The brilliant actress has not only proven her acting chops, but has time and again had us wishing we had her effortless confidence. While some of her film roles haven't been the best, some have been almost true to her real self, and given us some brilliant values to take from them. On her 30th birthday, today, here are four lessons we should borrow from her iconic film characters. Happy Birthday, Kangana! Never let a man dictate your happiness, like Rani in Queen Stay true to yourself, no matter what. Don't let the people around you tell you who to be - from Tanu in Tanu Weds Manu Julia in Rangoon showed us how to be fiery, strong, and fearless 
Learn from your mistakes, and don't let success get to your head - Shonali in Fashion Gif credit: Giphy
